sentences.en: And he began to implore Him earnestly not to send them out of the country.
sentences.cn: 可5:10就再三的求耶稣、要叫他们离开那地方.

sentences.en: And they began to implore Him to leave their region.
sentences.cn: 可5:17众人就央求耶稣离开他们的境界.

sentences.en: I do not implore God to give me again any, because I already had you!
sentences.cn: 我不祈求上帝再给我什么, 因为我已经拥有了你!

sentences.en: I implore you not to add your death to the bitterness of mine. "
sentences.cn: 我请求你别在我的痛苦之上再赔上你的这条命了. ”

sentences.en: I implore you not to leave me here.
sentences.cn: 求求你别把我留在这里.

sentences.en: I implore you to go now.
I implore you to write. At least tell me you're alive.
sentences.cn: 请给我音讯,让我知道你还活着.

sentences.en: If you want to go to the bathroom, you also don't implore me.
sentences.cn: “到时你要上厕所, 不要求我哦”.

sentences.en: Implore right ovary cyst to keep the effective medicine treating?
sentences.cn: 恳求右卵巢囊肿保守治疗的有效药?

sentences.en: Mercede's come to implore the protection of Mr. de Villefort.
sentences.cn: 美茜蒂丝来请求维尔福先生庇护.

sentences.en: Officers and tradesman are there to implore the gods to bless the voyage of Hamilcar.
sentences.cn: 官员和商人在那里求神保佑哈米尔卡一路平安.

sentences.en: Please implore someone else's help in a crisis.
We implore all of you to remain calm and assure that you area safe place.
sentences.cn: 我们恳求你们保持冷静,保证自己处在安全的位置.

sentences.en: We implore you to leave now.
sentences.cn: 我们恳求你现在就走吧.

sentences.en: Yes, Mother Regess, but only to implore you to end this struggle.
sentences.cn: 是, 瑞吉斯母亲, 但只是来恳求你结束这场战争.

trans.tran_en: to ask for something in an emotional way
